yoast_head:
<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v25.2 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>The Rising | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="A critical and commercial knockout — and his first album with the E Street Band in 18 years — The Rising is widely considered Springsteen's response to 9/11." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/the-rising/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="The Rising" />
<meta property="og:description" content="A critical and commercial knockout — and his first album with the E Street Band in 18 years — The Rising is widely considered Springsteen's response to 9/11. But it's also true that its core themes — faith, hope, loss and the creation of strength from each — were at heart a continuation of the work he'd begun decades before." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/the-rising/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Bruce Springsteen" />
<meta property="article:publisher" content="https://www.facebook.com/brucespringsteen" />

<meta property="og:image" content="https://cdn-p.smehost.net/sites/e8622626f9584d40b1a8fce8dfa6f567/wp-content/uploads/2002/07/og-springsteen-rising-front.jpg" />
	<meta property="og:image:width" content="1200" />
	<meta property="og:image:height" content="630" />
	<meta property="og:image:type" content="image/jpeg" />
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
<meta name="twitter:title" content="The Rising" />
<meta name="twitter:description" content="A critical and commercial knockout — and his first album with the E Street Band in 18 years — The Rising is widely considered Springsteen's response to 9/11. But it's also true that its core themes — faith, hope, loss and the creation of strength from each — were at heart a continuation of the work he'd begun decades before." />
<meta name="twitter:image" content="https://cdn-p.smehost.net/sites/e8622626f9584d40b1a8fce8dfa6f567/wp-content/uploads/2002/07/og-springsteen-rising-front.jpg" />
<meta name="twitter:site" content="@springsteen" />

yoast_head_json.title: The Rising | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: A critical and commercial knockout — and his first album with the E Street Band in 18 years — The Rising is widely considered Springsteen's response to 9/11.
yoast_head_json.og_description: A critical and commercial knockout — and his first album with the E Street Band in 18 years — The Rising is widely considered Springsteen's response to 9/11. But it's also true that its core themes — faith, hope, loss and the creation of strength from each — were at heart a continuation of the work he'd begun decades before.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: A critical and commercial knockout — and his first album with the E Street Band in 18 years — The Rising is widely considered Springsteen's response to 9/11. But it's also true that its core themes — faith, hope, loss and the creation of strength from each — were at heart a continuation of the work he'd begun decades before.
